item.title: At the cross…
item.dc:creator: GR 'Scott' Cundiff
item.description:
The occupied cross is the symbol of God’s love for us. The empty cross is our symbol of resurrection and hope. The carried cross is the mark of our continued sacrifice and commitment to Jesus. Luke 14:27  And anyone who does not carry his cross and follow me cannot be my disciple.

The post At the cross… first appeared on Pastor Scott's Ministerially Speaking.
